review: Awesome, I just connect my Samsung Galaxy Note 3, iPad and iPhone to it and excellent image in the TV. Also I can connect my computer which is not connected by WIFI, just wired to the router, which means that with the Chromecast you can connect any device that is in the network being WIFI or not. I recommended it, totally worth my money
author: Scarsms

review: This thing is super cool. I use it every day. Can stream just about anything to it
author: Disappointing

review: I own 2. I use one (and a Roku 3) in my living room. I use the other in my bedroom. I also downloaded and use the Chromecast app to "Cast Screen" from my android phone or iPad 4 to my Chromecast devices. For my needs, they all serve their purpose well. I HIGHLY recommend the free LocalCast app for streaming (aka casting) movies and TV shows with optional subtitles to Chromecast.
author: S. Gabriel
